trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods for processing Web requests.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Helper 方法以處理 Web 要求。

trans-unit.source: The methods and properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class are exposed through the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A> object provided by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 方法和屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別會公開透過內建<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>ASP.NET 所提供的物件。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192870).
trans-unit.target: 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192870)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method helps ensure that any user-supplied string input will be rendered as static text in browsers instead of executable script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>方法可協助確保將會轉譯為靜態文字，而不是可執行的指令碼或 HTML 元素的瀏覽器中輸入任何使用者提供的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> method encodes URLs so that they are correctly transmitted in the HTTP stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A>方法編碼的 Url，以便正確地傳送 HTTP 資料流中。

trans-unit.source: Clears the previous exception.
trans-unit.target: 清除先前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example clears the last exception that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會清除上次擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a server instance of a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 COM 物件的伺服器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The class or type of object to create an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 要建立執行個體的類別或物件類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a server instance of a COM object identified by the object's programmatic identifier (ProgID).
trans-unit.target: 建立物件程式設計識別項 (ProgID) 所識別之 COM 物件的伺服器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: 新物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an object by using the object's ProgID.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用物件的 ProgID 來建立物件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the object could not be created.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the object to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a server instance of a COM object identified by the object's type.
trans-unit.target: 建立以物件類型識別的 COM 物件的伺服器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: 新物件。

trans-unit.source: The class identifier of the object to create an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 要建立執行個體之物件的類別識別項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a server instance of a COM object identified by the object's class identifier (CLSID).
trans-unit.target: 建立以物件的類別識別項 (CLSID) 識別的 COM 物件的伺服器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: 新物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.CreateObjectFromClsid%2A> method to create a server instance of a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.CreateObjectFromClsid%2A>方法來建立 COM 物件的伺服器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the object could not be created.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Executes the handler for a specified resource in the context of the current request and returns execution to the page that invoked it.
trans-unit.target: 在目前要求的內容中執行指定資源的處理常式，並將執行傳回叫用它的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The URL path to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的 URL 路徑。

trans-unit.source: Executes the handler for the specified virtual path in the context of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 在目前要求的內容中，執行指定虛擬路徑的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method continues execution of the original page after execution of the new page is completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法會在新網頁的執行完成之後繼續執行原始頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method unconditionally transfers execution to another handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法無條件地將執行轉移至另一個處理常式。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource delivered by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 不會驗證目前使用者是否獲得授權檢視所傳遞的資源<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler indicated by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ASP.NET 授權和驗證邏輯會在呼叫原始資源的處理常式之前，ASP.NET 會直接呼叫所指定的處理常式<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法並不會重新執行驗證和授權邏輯新的資源。

trans-unit.source: If your application's security policy requires clients to have appropriate authorization to access the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式安全性原則需要有適當的權限可存取資源的用戶端，應用程式應該強制重新授權，或提供自訂的存取控制機制。

trans-unit.source: You can force reauthorization by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用強制重新授權<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> 執行用戶端重新導向瀏覽器要求新的資源。

trans-unit.source: Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both Internet Information Services (IIS) and ASP.NET security policy.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個重新導向時輸入系統的新要求，所以必須網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 ASP.NET 的安全性原則的所有驗證和授權邏輯。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method before the application calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用者已透過加入自訂授權使用的方法，檢視資源的權限<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法之前執行的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the .aspx page "Updateinfo.aspx" in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示.aspx 網頁 」 Updateinfo.aspx"在目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Program execution returns to the starting page after the Updateinfo.aspx page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 執行程式返回到起始頁 Updateinfo.aspx 頁面隨即顯示。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

An error occurred while executing the handler specified by <paramref name="path" />.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

<paramref name="path" /> is not a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 不是虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The URL path to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的 URL 路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preserve the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections; <see langword="false" /> to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示保留 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合；<see langword="false" /> 表示清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Executes the handler for the specified virtual path in the context of the current request and specifies whether to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: 在目前要求的內容中，執行指定虛擬路徑的處理常式，並指定是否清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to execute the .aspx page `Updateinfo.aspx` in the current request and preserve the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何執行.aspx 頁面`Updateinfo.aspx`在目前要求和保留<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>和<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Program execution returns to the starting page after `Updateinfo.aspx` is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 程式執行到起始頁之後會傳回`Updateinfo.aspx`隨即出現。

trans-unit.source: The following example executes the `Login.aspx` page on the server in the current directory and receives the output from the page through the <xref:System.IO.StringWriter> object `writer`.

trans-unit.source: It writes the HTML stream received from `writer` to the HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: 它會將收到來自 HTML 資料流`writer`至 HTTP 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.target: 執行 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的處理常式時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is not a virtual path.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 不是虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP handler that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> to transfer the current request to.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 處理常式，實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" />，以傳輸目前要求至此。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to capture the output.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取輸出的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preserve the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections; <see langword="false" /> to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示保留 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合；<see langword="false" /> 表示清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Executes the handler for the specified virtual path in the context of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 在目前要求的內容中，執行指定虛擬路徑的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> captures output from the executed handler and a Boolean parameter specifies whether to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 會擷取已執行處理常式的輸出，並且布林參數會指定是否要清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: You can write custom HTTP handlers to process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests in any language that is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS).
trans-unit.target: 您可以撰寫自訂 HTTP 處理常式來處理 HTTP 要求中任何以 Common Language Specification (CLS) 相容的語言特定的預先定義的類型。

trans-unit.source: Executable code that is defined in the HTTP handler classes instead of conventional ASP (also known as classic ASP) pages or ASP.NET pages responds to these specific requests.
trans-unit.target: 定義 HTTP 處理常式類別，而不是傳統 ASP (也稱為傳統 ASP) 網頁或 ASP.NET 網頁中的可執行程式碼回應這些特定的要求。

trans-unit.source: HTTP handlers allow for interacting with the low-level request and response services of a Web server that is running Internet Information Services (IIS), and they provide functionality that is similar to ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model.
trans-unit.target: 進行互動的低層級的要求和回應服務的 Web 伺服器正在執行網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 允許 HTTP 處理常式，並且會提供類似功能的 ISAPI 擴充程式但更簡單的程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource that is delivered by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 不會驗證目前使用者是否獲得授權檢視資源前所交付<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ASP.NET 授權和驗證邏輯會在呼叫原始資源的處理常式之前，ASP.NET 會直接呼叫處理常式所指定之<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法並不會重新執行驗證和授權邏輯新的資源。

trans-unit.source: If the security policy for your application requires clients to have appropriate authorization to gain access to the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式的安全性原則需要用戶端具有適當的授權，才能存取資源，應用程式應該強制重新授權，或提供的自訂存取控制機制。

trans-unit.source: You can force reauthorization by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用強制重新授權<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>用戶端重新導向瀏覽器要求新的資源。

trans-unit.source: Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both the IIS and ASP.NET security policy.
trans-unit.target: 這個重新導向時輸入系統的新要求，因為它必須同時 IIS 和 ASP.NET 的安全性原則的所有驗證和授權邏輯。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method before the application calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用者已透過加入自訂授權使用的方法，檢視資源的權限<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法之前執行的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the handler specified by <paramref name="handler" />.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <paramref name="handler" /> 指定的處理常式時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="handler" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handler" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the previous exception.
trans-unit.target: 傳回先前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The previous exception that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回的先前例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example prints a description of the application's last error to the HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列印至 HTTP 輸出資料流的應用程式的最後一個錯誤的描述。

trans-unit.source: It prints "No Errors" if no errors have been encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果不發生任何錯誤，它會顯示 「 沒有錯誤 」。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a string that has been encoded to eliminate invalid HTML characters.
trans-unit.target: 將已經編碼排除無效 HTML 字元的字串解碼。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebUtility" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebUtility" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The HTML string to decode.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的 HTML 字串。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an HTML-encoded string and returns the decoded string.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTML 編碼字串解碼，並傳回解碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: The decoded text.
trans-unit.target: 解碼的文字。

trans-unit.source: HTML encoding makes sure that text is displayed correctly in the browser and not interpreted by the browser as HTML.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼確保文字會正確顯示在瀏覽器並不會解譯為 HTML 瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a text string contains a less than sign (\<) or greater than sign (>), the browser would interpret these characters as the opening or closing bracket of an HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果文字字串包含小於符號 (\<) 或大於符號 (>)，瀏覽器會將這些字元解譯為左或右括號的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: When the characters are HTML encoded, they are converted to the strings `<` and `>`, which causes the browser to display the less than sign and greater than sign correctly.
trans-unit.target: 當字元會以 HTML 編碼時，公告會轉換成字串`<`和`>`，因而導致瀏覽器顯示小於符號和大於號正確。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A> decodes text that has been transmitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A> 將解碼已被傳送到伺服器的文字。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是便利的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to decode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，這個方法會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>来解碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the code-behind file for an ASP.NET web page, access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class through the `Server` property.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET web 網頁的程式碼後置檔案中，存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別透過`Server`屬性。

trans-unit.source: In a class that is not in a code-behind file, use `HttpContext.Current.Server` to access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼後置檔案中沒有類別中，使用`HttpContext.Current.Server`存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別。

trans-unit.source: Outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class to encode or decode values.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式之外使用<xref:System.Net.WebUtility>類別來編碼或解碼的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example contains the function `LoadDecodedFile`, which decodes the data from a file and copies it into one string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例包含函式`LoadDecodedFile`，這將檔案中的資料解碼，並將它複製到一個字串。

trans-unit.source: The HTML string to decode.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的 HTML 字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream that contains the decoded string.
trans-unit.target: 包含已解碼字串的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an HTML-encoded string and sends the resulting output to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTML 編碼字串解碼，並送出結果輸出至 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: HTML encoding makes sure that text is displayed correctly in the browser and not interpreted by the browser as HTML.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼確保文字會正確顯示在瀏覽器並不會解譯為 HTML 瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a text string contains a less than sign (\<) or greater than sign (>), the browser would interpret these characters as the opening or closing bracket of an HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果文字字串包含小於符號 (\<) 或大於符號 (>)，瀏覽器會將這些字元解譯為左或右括號的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: When the characters are HTML encoded, they are converted to the strings `<` and `>`, which causes the browser to display the less than sign and greater than sign correctly.
trans-unit.target: 當字元會以 HTML 編碼時，公告會轉換成字串`<`和`>`，因而導致瀏覽器顯示小於符號和大於號正確。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A> decodes text that has been transmitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A> 將解碼已被傳送到伺服器的文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A> is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A> 是方便的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A> uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to decode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlDecode%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>来解碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example decodes a string that has been HTML-encoded for transmission over HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將已傳輸的 HTML 編碼透過 HTTP 的字串解碼。

trans-unit.source: It decodes the supplied string named `EncodedString` which contains the text "This is a <Test String>.", and copies it into the string named `DecodedString` as "This is a \<Test String>.".
trans-unit.target: 它提供將字串解碼，名為`EncodedString`其中包含文字"這是<測試字串>。 」，並將它複製到名為字串`DecodedString`做為 「 這是\<測試字串 >。 」。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a string to be displayed in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 將字串編碼以顯示於瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebUtility" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebUtility" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The text string to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: HTML-encodes a string and returns the encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 將字串作 HTML 編碼，並傳回編碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: The HTML-encoded text.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼的文字。

trans-unit.source: HTML encoding makes sure that text is displayed correctly in the browser and not interpreted by the browser as HTML.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼確保文字會正確顯示在瀏覽器並不會解譯為 HTML 瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a text string contains a less than sign (\<) or greater than sign (>), the browser would interpret these characters as the opening or closing bracket of an HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果文字字串包含小於符號 (\<) 或大於符號 (>)，瀏覽器會將這些字元解譯為左或右括號的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: When the characters are HTML encoded, they are converted to the strings `<` and `>`, which causes the browser to display the less than sign and greater than sign correctly.
trans-unit.target: 當字元會以 HTML 編碼時，公告會轉換成字串`<`和`>`，因而導致瀏覽器顯示小於符號和大於號正確。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是便利的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to encode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，這個方法會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>編碼字串。

trans-unit.source: In the code-behind file for an ASP.NET web page, access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class through the `Server` property.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET web 網頁的程式碼後置檔案中，存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別透過`Server`屬性。

trans-unit.source: In a class that is not in a code-behind file, use `HttpContext.Current.Server` to access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼後置檔案中沒有類別中，使用`HttpContext.Current.Server`存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別。

trans-unit.source: Outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class to encode or decode values.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式之外使用<xref:System.Net.WebUtility>類別來編碼或解碼的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to HTML-encode a value that potentially codes unsafe code.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以 HTML 編碼的值，可能代碼 unsafe 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The code resides in the code-behind file for a web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼位於 web 網頁的程式碼後置檔案中。

trans-unit.source: The value to encode is hard-coded in this example only to simplify the example and show the type of value you might HTML-encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的值是硬式編碼在此範例僅供簡化範例，顯示值的型別，您可能會進行 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would HTML-encode a value that you received from the user or the request.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您就是進行 HTML 編碼所收到使用者或要求的值。

trans-unit.source: `Result` refers to a `Literal` control.
trans-unit.target: `Result` 是指`Literal`控制項。

trans-unit.source: The next example is similar to the previous example except it shows how to HTML-encode a value from within a class that is not in the code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例是類似於先前的範例，但它會顯示如何以 HTML 編碼類別內的值不在程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: The string to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream that contains the encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 包含已編碼字串的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: HTML-encodes a string and sends the resulting output to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將字串作 HTML 編碼，並送出結果輸出至 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: HTML encoding ensures that text will be correctly displayed in the browser, not interpreted by the browser as HTML.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼，可確保文字將會正確顯示瀏覽器中，不會解譯為 HTML 瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a text string contains a less than sign (\<) or greater than sign (>), the browser would interpret these characters as an opening or closing bracket of an HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果文字字串包含小於符號 (\<) 或大於符號 (>)，瀏覽器會將這些字元解譯為左或右括號的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The HTML encoding of these two characters is `<` and `>`, respectively, which causes the browser to display the less than sign and greater than sign correctly.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個字元的 HTML 編碼方式是`<`和`>`分別，因而導致瀏覽器顯示小於符號和大於號正確。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> 是方便的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to encode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.HtmlEncode%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>編碼字串。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example encodes a string for transmission by HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將字串編碼以進行 HTTP 傳輸。

trans-unit.source: It encodes the string named `TestString`, which contains the text "This is a \<Test String>.", and copies it into the string named `EncodedString` as "This is a <Test String>.".
trans-unit.target: 它將名為的字串編碼`TestString`，其中包含文字"這是\<測試字串 >。 」，並將它複製到名為字串`EncodedString`做為 「 這是<測試字串>。"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the server's computer name.
trans-unit.target: 取得伺服器的電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 本機電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example stores the server's computer name as a string variable.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將伺服器的電腦名稱儲存為字串變數。

trans-unit.source: The computer name cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path in the Web application.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式中的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the physical file path that corresponds to the specified virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回對應於指定虛擬路徑的實體檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The physical file path on the Web server that corresponds to <paramref name="path" />.
trans-unit.target: 網頁伺服器上對應至 <paramref name="path" /> 的實體檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: If `path` is `null`, the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath%2A> method returns the full physical path of the directory that contains the current request for the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`是`null`、<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath%2A>方法會傳回包含目前要求路徑之目錄的完整實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The relative path does not need to specify an existing file or folder for this method to return a value.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑不會不需要指定現有的檔案或資料夾，此方法傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: However, you cannot specify a path outside of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您無法指定 Web 應用程式之外的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath%2A> method potentially contains sensitive information about the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.MapPath%2A>方法可能包含機密資訊的裝載環境。

trans-unit.source: The return value should not be displayed to users.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值不應該顯示給使用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the request time-out value in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定要求的逾時值 (以秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The time-out value setting for requests.
trans-unit.target: 要求的逾時值設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A> property can be set in the Web.config file by setting the `executionTimeout` attribute of the element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A>可以在 Web.config 檔案中設定屬性，藉由設定`executionTimeout`項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the time-out programmatically with the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A> property takes precedence over the Web.config setting.
trans-unit.target: 設定逾時以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A>屬性會優先於 Web.config 設定。

trans-unit.source: If you set the `debug` attribute of the element to `true` in the Web.config file, the value of <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A> will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定`debug`至項目的屬性`true`在 Web.config 檔案中，值<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.ScriptTimeout%2A>會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the request time-out period to 60 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定要求逾時期限為 60 秒。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The time-out period is <see langword="null" /> or otherwise could not be set.
trans-unit.target: 逾時期間為 <see langword="null" />，否則不能被設定。

trans-unit.source: Terminates execution of the current page and starts execution of a new page for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 結束目前網頁的執行，開始針對目前的要求執行新網頁。

trans-unit.source: The URL path of the new page on the server to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要在伺服器上執行之新網頁的 URL 路徑。

trans-unit.source: For the current request, terminates execution of the current page and starts execution of a new page by using the specified URL path of the page.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前的要求結束目前網頁的執行，並使用指定的網頁 URL 路徑開始執行新網頁。

trans-unit.source: The page transferred to should be another .aspx page.
trans-unit.target: 傳送到網頁應該是另一個.aspx 網頁。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a transfer to an .asp or .asmx page is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，傳輸至.asp 或.asmx 頁面不正確。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method preserves the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法可保留<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>和<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> calls <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>, which throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception upon completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> 呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>，哪些則會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>完成時的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource delivered by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 不會驗證目前使用者是否獲得授權檢視所傳遞的資源<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler indicated by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ASP.NET 授權和驗證邏輯會在呼叫原始資源的處理常式之前，ASP.NET 會直接呼叫所指定的處理常式<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法並不會重新執行驗證和授權邏輯新的資源。

trans-unit.source: If your application's security policy requires clients to have appropriate authorization to access the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式安全性原則需要有適當的權限可存取資源的用戶端，應用程式應該強制重新授權，或提供自訂的存取控制機制。

trans-unit.source: You can force reauthorization by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用強制重新授權<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法會執行用戶端重新導向瀏覽器要求新的資源。

trans-unit.source: Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both Internet Information Services (IIS) and ASP.NET security policy.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個重新導向時輸入系統的新要求，所以必須網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 ASP.NET 的安全性原則的所有驗證和授權邏輯。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method before the application calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用者已透過加入自訂授權使用的方法，檢視資源的權限<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法之前執行的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The URL path of the new page on the server to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要在伺服器上執行之新網頁的 URL 路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preserve the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections; <see langword="false" /> to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示保留 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合；<see langword="false" /> 表示清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Terminates execution of the current page and starts execution of a new page by using the specified URL path of the page.
trans-unit.target: 結束目前網頁的執行，並使用指定的網頁 URL 路徑開始執行新網頁。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The page transferred to should be another .aspx page.
trans-unit.target: 傳送到網頁應該是另一個.aspx 網頁。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a transfer to an .asp or .asmx page is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，傳輸至.asp 或.asmx 頁面不正確。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> calls <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>, which throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> exception upon completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> 呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.End%2A>，哪些則會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>完成時的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you set the `preserveForm` parameter to `true`, the target page will be able to access the view state of the previous page by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定`preserveForm`參數`true`，[目標] 頁面將能夠透過存取前一頁的檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, you should keep the `enableViewStateMac` attribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性目的，您應該保留`enableViewStateMac`屬性設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource delivered by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 不會驗證目前使用者是否獲得授權檢視所傳遞的資源<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler indicated by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ASP.NET 授權和驗證邏輯會在呼叫原始資源的處理常式之前，ASP.NET 會直接呼叫所指定的處理常式<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法並不會重新執行驗證和授權邏輯新的資源。

trans-unit.source: If your application's security policy requires clients to have appropriate authorization to access the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式安全性原則需要有適當的權限可存取資源的用戶端，應用程式應該強制重新授權，或提供自訂的存取控制機制。

trans-unit.source: You can force reauthorization by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用強制重新授權<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法會執行用戶端重新導向瀏覽器要求新的資源。

trans-unit.source: Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both Internet Information Services (IIS) and ASP.NET security policy.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個重新導向時輸入系統的新要求，所以必須網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 ASP.NET 的安全性原則的所有驗證和授權邏輯。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method before the application calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用者已透過加入自訂授權使用的方法，檢視資源的權限<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法之前執行的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example executes a new page in the same directory as the current page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會執行目前的頁面相同目錄中新的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The current page request is a callback.
trans-unit.target: 目前的網頁要求為回呼。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP handler that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> to transfer the current request to.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 處理常式，實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" />，以傳輸目前要求至此。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preserve the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections; <see langword="false" /> to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示保留 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合；<see langword="false" /> 表示清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Terminates execution of the current page and starts execution of a new request by using a custom HTTP handler that implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> interface and specifies whether to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collections.
trans-unit.target: 結束目前網頁的執行，並使用實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 介面的自訂 HTTP 處理常式開始執行新要求，以及指定是否要清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: You can write custom HTTP handlers to process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests in any language that is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS).
trans-unit.target: 您可以撰寫自訂 HTTP 處理常式來處理 HTTP 要求中任何以 Common Language Specification (CLS) 相容的語言特定的預先定義的類型。

trans-unit.source: Executable code that is defined in the HTTP handler classes instead of conventional ASP (also known as classic ASP) pages or ASP.NET pages responds to these specific requests.
trans-unit.target: 定義 HTTP 處理常式類別，而不是傳統 ASP (也稱為傳統 ASP) 網頁或 ASP.NET 網頁中的可執行程式碼回應這些特定的要求。

trans-unit.source: HTTP handlers allow for interacting with the low-level request and response services of a Web server that is running Internet Information Services (IIS), and they provide functionality that is similar to ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model.
trans-unit.target: 進行互動的低層級的要求和回應服務的 Web 伺服器正在執行網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 允許 HTTP 處理常式，並且會提供類似功能的 ISAPI 擴充程式但更簡單的程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: If you set the `preserveForm` parameter to `true`, the target page will be able to access the view state of the previous page by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定`preserveForm`參數`true`，[目標] 頁面將能夠透過存取前一頁的檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, you should keep the `enableViewStateMac` attribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性目的，您應該保留`enableViewStateMac`屬性設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not verify that the current user is authorized to view the resource delivered by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 不會驗證目前使用者是否獲得授權檢視所傳遞的資源<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the ASP.NET authorization and authentication logic runs before the original resource handler is called, ASP.NET directly calls the handler indicated by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method, and does not rerun authentication and authorization logic for the new resource.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 ASP.NET 授權和驗證邏輯會在呼叫原始資源的處理常式之前，ASP.NET 會直接呼叫所指定的處理常式<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法，並針對新的作用不會重新執行驗證和授權邏輯資源。

trans-unit.source: If the security policy for your application requires clients to have appropriate authorization to access the resource, the application should force reauthorization or provide a custom access-control mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式的安全性原則需要有適當的權限可存取資源的用戶端，應該強制重新授權應用程式，或提供的自訂存取控制機制。

trans-unit.source: You can force reauthorization by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用強制重新授權<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A> method performs a client-side redirect in which the browser requests the new resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Redirect%2A>方法會執行用戶端重新導向瀏覽器要求新的資源。

trans-unit.source: Because this redirect is a new request entering the system, it is subjected to all the authentication and authorization logic of both the IIS and ASP.NET security policy.
trans-unit.target: 這個重新導向時輸入系統的新要求，因為它必須同時 IIS 和 ASP.NET 的安全性原則的所有驗證和授權邏輯。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that the user has permission to view the resource by incorporating a custom authorization method that uses the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method before the application calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用者已透過加入自訂授權使用的方法，檢視資源的權限<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法之前執行的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The current page request is a callback.
trans-unit.target: 目前的網頁要求為回呼。

trans-unit.source: Performs an asynchronous execution of the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 執行所指定 URL 的非同步執行工作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%2A> was introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進了。

trans-unit.source: For summary information about the .NET Framework, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: The URL path of the new page on the server to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要在伺服器上執行之新網頁的 URL 路徑。

trans-unit.source: Performs an asynchronous execution of the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 執行所指定 URL 的非同步執行工作。

trans-unit.source: This method overload calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%2A> overload with the `preserveForm` parameter set to `false`, the `method` parameter set to `null`, the `headers` parameter set to `null`, and the `preserveUser` parameter set to `true`.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP method to use in the execution of the new request.
trans-unit.target: 用於執行新要求的 HTTP 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> of request headers for the new request.
trans-unit.target: 新要求之要求標頭的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs an asynchronous execution of the specified URL using the specified HTTP method and headers.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 HTTP 方法與標頭執行所指定 URL 的非同步執行工作。

trans-unit.source: This method is used when running with the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to allow request processing to be transferred from one resource type to another while executing the target request with the correct request context.
trans-unit.target: 使用的整合式的管線模式中執行時，這個方法用[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]允許從一個資源類型到另一個傳送執行正確的要求內容的目標要求時的要求處理。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%2A> method to transfer a request for an ASPX page to a request for an XML page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%2A>方法來傳輸要求 XML 頁面的 ASPX 頁面的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%2A> method performs an asynchronous child execution of the specified URL with the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%2A>方法執行非同步的子系執行所指定的 url，使用以下條件：

trans-unit.source: If the `path` parameter specifies a query string, it will be used as the new query string.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`參數指定的查詢字串，它會當做新的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: If no query string is included, the query string of the request will be re-used.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含任何查詢字串，不則要求的查詢字串將會重複使用。

trans-unit.source: If the `method` parameter is specified, it will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`參數指定，則會使用它。

trans-unit.source: If it is `null`, the HTTP method of the original request will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果是`null`，將會使用原始要求的 HTTP 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the `preserveForm` parameter is `true`, the current entity body of the request will be available to the target request.
trans-unit.target: 如果`preserveForm`參數是`true`，目前實體的要求將提供給目標要求。

trans-unit.source: This allows form posts and uploads to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓表單張貼，並上傳至傳輸。

trans-unit.source: If the user identity is currently set on the original request, the identity will be transferred to the new request.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的原始要求上設定的使用者身分識別，身分識別將轉移到新的要求。

trans-unit.source: This allows authenticated requests to re-use the result of the authentication for the new request.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓已驗證的要求，重複使用的新要求的驗證結果。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the user to be transferred, set the user to `null` on the original request before transferring.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要傳送的使用者，將使用者設定為`null`之前在原始要求。

trans-unit.source: If the `headers` parameter is specified, the new request will execute with the specified headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果`headers`參數指定，則新的要求將使用指定的標頭來執行。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to modify the request headers and cookies for the new request, or add a special header that specifies where the original request was received.
trans-unit.target: 這可以用來修改要求標頭和新的要求，cookie，或加入特殊的標頭，指定已在接收到原始要求。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload with the `preserveUser` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法多載`preserveUser`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The request requires [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] running in integrated mode.
trans-unit.target: 此要求需要 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 以 Integrated 模式執行。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數是無效的。

trans-unit.source: The path.
trans-unit.target: 路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preserve the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collection; <see langword="false" /> to clear the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示保留 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合，<see langword="false" /> 表示清除 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.Form" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP method to use in the new request.
trans-unit.target: 用於新要求的 HTTP 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> object that contains request headers for the new request.
trans-unit.target: 包含新要求之要求標頭的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preserve the user identity; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要保留使用者識別，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The other method overloads of this method call this overload with this parameter set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的其他方法多載會呼叫這個多載（在此參數設定為<see langword="true" />的情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Performs an asynchronous execution of the specified URL using the specified HTTP method, headers, and path, and optionally preserves form values and the user identity.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 HTTP 方法、標頭和路徑，並選擇性地保留表單值和使用者識別，執行所指定 URL 的非同步執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Remarks" section in <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.TransferRequest%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29>。

trans-unit.source: The request requires the integrated pipeline mode of [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此要求需要 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 的 Integrated 管線模式。

trans-unit.source: The server is not available to handle the request.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器無法用來處理要求。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數是無效的。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a string that was encoded for HTTP transmission and then sent to the server in a URL.
trans-unit.target: 將編碼為 HTTP 傳輸的字串解碼，並以 URL 送至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebUtility" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebUtility" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The text string to decode.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: URL-decodes a string and returns the decoded string.
trans-unit.target: 將字串作 URL 解碼，並傳回解碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: The decoded text.
trans-unit.target: 解碼的文字。

trans-unit.source: URL encoding ensures that all browsers will correctly transmit text in URL strings.
trans-unit.target: URL 編碼，可確保所有瀏覽器將會正確傳輸 URL 字串中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 字元，例如問題標記 （？）、 連字號 (&)、 斜線符號 （/），和空格可能會被截斷或某些瀏覽器損毀。

trans-unit.source: As a result, these characters must be encoded in `<a>` tags or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，這些字元必須編碼在`<a>`標記，或在查詢字串的字串可以所要求之字串中的瀏覽器重新傳送。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是便利的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to decode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，這個方法會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>来解碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the code-behind file for an ASP.NET web page, access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class through the `Server` property.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET web 網頁的程式碼後置檔案中，存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別透過`Server`屬性。

trans-unit.source: In a class that is not in a code-behind file, use `HttpContext.Current.Server` to access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼後置檔案中沒有類別中，使用`HttpContext.Current.Server`存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別。

trans-unit.source: Outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class to encode or decode values.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式之外使用<xref:System.Net.WebUtility>類別來編碼或解碼的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to URL-decode a value that is retrieved from the query string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何進行 URL 解碼值是從所擷取的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: The code resides in the code-behind file for a web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼位於 web 網頁的程式碼後置檔案中。

trans-unit.source: `ReturnPage` refers to a `HyperLink` control.
trans-unit.target: `ReturnPage` 是指`HyperLink`控制項。

trans-unit.source: The next example is similar to the previous example except it shows how to URL-decode a value from within a class that is not in the code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例是類似於先前的範例，但它會顯示如何進行 URL 解碼值從類別內，不是程式碼後置檔案中。

trans-unit.source: The HTML string to decode.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的 HTML 字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream that contains the decoded string.
trans-unit.target: 包含已解碼字串的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Decodes an HTML string received in a URL and sends the resulting output to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將 URL 中收到的 HTML 字串解碼，並送出結果輸出至 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: URL encoding ensures that all browsers will correctly transmit text in URL strings.
trans-unit.target: URL 編碼，可確保所有瀏覽器將會正確傳輸 URL 字串中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 字元，例如問題標記 （？）、 連字號 (&)、 斜線符號 （/），和空格可能會被截斷或某些瀏覽器損毀。

trans-unit.source: As a result, these characters must be encoded in `<a>` tags or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，這些字元必須編碼在`<a>`標記，或在查詢字串的字串可以所要求之字串中的瀏覽器重新傳送。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode%2A> is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode%2A> 是方便的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode%2A> uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to decode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlDecode%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>来解碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example decodes the string named `EncodedString` (received in a URL) into the string named `DecodedString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將名為字串`EncodedString`（在 URL 中接收） 到名為字串`DecodedString`。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a string for reliable HTTP transmission from the Web server to a client through the URL.
trans-unit.target: 經由 URL 將字串編碼，以進行從 Web 伺服器至用戶端的可靠 HTTP 傳輸。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> 是方便的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to encode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>編碼字串。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The text to URL-encode.
trans-unit.target: 要作 URL 編碼的文字。

trans-unit.source: URL-encodes a string and returns the encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 將字串作 URL 編碼，並傳回編碼的字串。

trans-unit.source: The URL-encoded text.
trans-unit.target: URL 編碼的文字。

trans-unit.source: URL encoding ensures that all browsers will correctly transmit text in URL strings.
trans-unit.target: URL 編碼，可確保所有瀏覽器將會正確傳輸 URL 字串中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 字元，例如問題標記 （？）、 連字號 (&)、 斜線符號 （/），和空格可能會被截斷或某些瀏覽器損毀。

trans-unit.source: As a result, these characters must be encoded in `<a>` tags or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，這些字元必須編碼在`<a>`標記，或在查詢字串的字串可以所要求之字串中的瀏覽器重新傳送。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是便利的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to encode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，這個方法會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>編碼字串。

trans-unit.source: In the code-behind file for an ASP.NET web page, access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class through the `Server` property.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET web 網頁的程式碼後置檔案中，存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別透過`Server`屬性。

trans-unit.source: In a class that is not in a code-behind file, use `HttpContext.Current.Server` to access an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼後置檔案中沒有類別中，使用`HttpContext.Current.Server`存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別。

trans-unit.source: Outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class to encode or decode values.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式之外使用<xref:System.Net.WebUtility>類別來編碼或解碼的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to URL-encode a value that is used as a query string value of a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何要作 URL 編碼的值，可做為超連結的查詢字串值。

trans-unit.source: The code resides in the code-behind file for a web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼位於 web 網頁的程式碼後置檔案中。

trans-unit.source: The value to encode is hard-coded in this example only to simplify the example and show the type of value you might URL-encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的值是硬式編碼在此範例僅供簡化範例，顯示值的型別，您可能要作 URL 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would URL-encode a value that you received from the user or the request.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您就是要作 URL 編碼值，您有來自使用者或要求。

trans-unit.source: `NextPage` refers to a `HyperLink` control.
trans-unit.target: `NextPage` 是指`HyperLink`控制項。

trans-unit.source: The next example is similar to the previous example except it shows how to URL-encode a value from within a class that is not in the code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例是類似於先前的範例，但它會顯示如何要作 URL 編碼類別內的值不在程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: The text string to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream that contains the encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 包含已編碼字串的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: URL-encodes a string and sends the resulting output to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將字串作 URL 編碼，並送出結果輸出至 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: URL encoding ensures that all browsers will correctly transmit text in URL strings.
trans-unit.target: URL 編碼，可確保所有瀏覽器將會正確傳輸 URL 字串中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 字元，例如問題標記 （？）、 連字號 (&)、 斜線符號 （/），和空格可能會被截斷或某些瀏覽器損毀。

trans-unit.source: As a result, these characters must be encoded in `<a>` tags or in query strings where the strings can be re-sent by a browser in a request string.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，這些字元必須編碼在`<a>`標記，或在查詢字串的字串可以所要求之字串中的瀏覽器重新傳送。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> is a convenient way to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at run time from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> 是方便的方式來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法在執行階段從 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Internally, <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A> uses <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to encode strings.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>編碼字串。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要編碼或解碼 Web 應用程式之外的值，請使用 <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example encodes a string for transmission by HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將字串編碼以進行 HTTP 傳輸。

trans-unit.source: It encodes the string named `TestString`, which contains the text "This is a \<Test String>.", and copies it into the string named `EncodedString` as "This+is+a+%3cTest+String%3e.".
trans-unit.target: 它將名為的字串編碼`TestString`，其中包含文字"這是\<測試字串 >。 」，並將它複製到名為字串`EncodedString`做為"這個 + 是 + a + %3ctest + 字串 %3e。 」。

trans-unit.source: The text to URL-encode.
trans-unit.target: 要作 URL 編碼的文字。

trans-unit.source: Do not use; intended only for browser compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用，只在需要瀏覽器相容性時使用。

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlEncode(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL encoded text.
trans-unit.target: URL 編碼的文字。

trans-unit.source: The URL string token to decode.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的 URL 字串語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a URL string token to its equivalent byte array using base 64 digits.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Base 64 數字，將 URL 字串語彙基元解碼成其對應的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The byte array containing the decoded URL string token.
trans-unit.target: 包含已解碼 URL 字串語彙基元的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenDecode%2A> method converts a URL string token, which encodes binary data as base 64 digits, to its equivalent byte array representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenDecode%2A>方法會將 URL 字串語彙基元，二進位資料編碼為 base 64 數字，轉換為其對應的位元組陣列表示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenDecode%2A> method to decode tokens transmitted on the URL and encoded by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenEncode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenDecode%2A>方法來解碼語彙基元在 URL 上傳輸和編碼使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenEncode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenDecode%2A> method will return an empty byte array if the `input` parameter has a length of less than one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenDecode%2A>方法會傳回空的位元組陣列，如果`input`參數的長度小於 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="input" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The byte array to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要編碼的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a byte array into its equivalent string representation using base 64 digits, which is usable for transmission on the URL.
trans-unit.target: 將位元組陣列編碼成其對等的字串表示，該字串使用 Base 64 數字且可在 URL 上傳輸。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the encoded token if the byte array *length* is greater than one; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果位元組陣列 *length* 大於一，則為包含已編碼語彙基元的字串；否則為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenEncode%2A> method converts a byte array into an equivalent string representation encoded with base 64 digits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenEncode%2A>方法將位元組陣列轉換成以 base 64 數字編碼的相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The resulting string token can be transmitted on the URL.
trans-unit.target: 可以在 URL 上傳輸產生的字串語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenEncode%2A> will return an empty string if the `input` parameter has a length of less than one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.UrlTokenEncode%2A>會傳回空字串，如果`input`參數的長度小於 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="input" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。
